nodes.text: The Army of Light was an army of Jedi within the Jedi Order that fought in several crusades against the Brotherhood of Darkness. According to old records, the ancient Jedi Master Morrit Ch'gally served within the Army of Light as a veteran of the crusades, and created the discipline of the Jedi Sentinel, whilst a member of the Acquisition Division.
The Army of Light was reintroduced into Star Wars canon in the 2016 reference book Endless Vigil.

In Star Wars Legends, the Army of Light was an army formed by Jedi Lord Hoth to combat the Brotherhood of Darkness during the New Sith Wars. It made its first appearance in Star Wars Legends in the first issue of the Star Wars: Jedi vs. Sith series of comics, which was released on April 18, 2001.
